parameters.name: dataSourceName
parameters.description: The name of the data source.

parameters.name: domainName
parameters.description: The data center where the data source is deployed.

parameters.name: validStatus
parameters.description:
Specifies the index versions to be returned. Valid values:

1.  true (default): returns the index versions that are complete and not expired.
2.  false: returns all index versions.
